Trigger.name: Puncture
Trigger.script:
if matches[2]:lower() == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a lightning\-fast jab of your blade (you) puncture the cluster of nerves just below the \w+ shoulder of (.+)\.$
^(\w+) lashes out with lightning speed, \w+ blade driving into (.+) just beneath \w+ \w+ shoulder\.$
